question: What is termed as Loss Asset?
option1: sub-standard asset for more than 3 years
option2: sub-standard asset for more than 2 years
option3: sub-standard asset for more than 1 years
answer: sub-standard asset for more than 3 years
explanation: If the loan is not repaid even after it remains sub-standard asset for more than 3 years, it may be identified as unrecoverable by internal / external audit and it would be called loss asset.
